Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) and grease the cookie sheets.

In a medium bowl, beat the butter and sugar together until smooth. Gradually add the eggs, mixing in one at a time. Incorporate the cornstarch, cream of tartar, and baking powder until fully combined. Form the dough into 1-inch balls and arrange them 1 inch apart on the prepared cookie sheets.
